column1: #Text=Northern soldier says : " You hoodlums think you 're tough , huh ? "
#Text=Southern civilian says : " Pick on a waterbender your own size ! "
#Text=Southern civilian says : " Tell these thugs to go back to the North .
#Text=You 're all part of the same tribe , start acting like it .
#Text=" Southern civilian says : " You 're taking their side ?
#Text=We thought you were one of us .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not taking anyone 's side .
#Text=" Little girl says : " You 're the worst Avatar ever !
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Everyone , walk away from this .
